HitNearFriendInNeedBuffer.Description: Survivors near friend in need are still considered nearby after leaving range for this time afterwards

HitNearUnhookedFriendInNeed_OncePer.Description: HitNearUnhookedFriendInNeed can only happen once in that interval

WasUnhooked.Description: A camper is considered recently unhooked if it happened at most that many seconds ago

HitAfterActivePhaseWalk.Description: Time in seconds after exiting active phase walk during which the Spirit will score if he hits a survivor

GrabAfterActivePhaseWalk.Description: Time in seconds after exiting active phase walk during which the Spirit will score if he hits a survivor

GeneratorTeleportTimeToHitCamperAfterTel.Description: Time in seconds after using generator teleport during which you can gain bonus deviousness points

CamperVaultInChaseScoreCooldown.Description: Minimum time between 2 vaultInChase score events.
